attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD😿😿😿😿
attributes.review: i am FUMING. first of all, the app took 56 HOURS to download😾😾which made me very angry, but i decided to wait it out for my beloved trumpet-poo. once i got onto the app trump messaged me asking if he could touch me penis and i said no! but he decided to reach through the screen and lick my nipples anyways. i’m really sad and ANGERY!!! at him SO DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!! unless you want sex with mr donalg👅👅🤩🤪😜😜😛😄😜🤩😻😻😻😻🍕😹😹😹👁👅👁🧚‍♀️🧚‍♀️💅🏻✨✨🧚‍♀️i hate you trump!!! don’t touch my pp again!

attributes.title: oh no
attributes.review:
I opened the app just waiting for all the hate free app events to start but as I opened it, the opposite happened! Oh well. Then when I tried to put in my phone number bc why wouldn’t I want our dearest bestest goodest president’s faithful texts every single day, the app crashed! Guess it’s a sign. Sign for what? For a baseline education so his supporters could maybe learn something. 
just a suggestion🧚‍♂️🧚✨

attributes.title: No Photos?!
attributes.review: Probably the worst app in the history of all apps. My photos? All mysteriously deleted. I keep getting a bunch of pop up ads for the election even after I deleted the app, and my phone battery is suddenly dying every couple minutes, I’ve had to keep my phone plugged into the wall for a week now. 0/10. Would not recommend.

attributes.title: Horrible…🧚🏼‍♂️☹️🧚🏼‍♂️
attributes.review: It took forever to download like 2 years, I was waiting for an eternity and then once the app was downloaded it stole all my data and personal information, like what app does that. Anyways after that the app kept acting app, it would show me horrible things and tell me death threats. The app was starting to scare me so I deleted it. I will never get this app again 🧚🏼😒😄💀☹️🧚🏼💫

attributes.title: worst app i’ve ever used.
attributes.review: this app took HOURS to download. when it FINALLY DID DOWNLOAD i tried using it and it wouldn’t even load. that just doesn’t make any sense to me. i finally got it to load and i couldn’t figure it out. it hard to navigate and i couldn’t find any information out about anything. i will never use this app again. i do not recommend this app.

attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY HORRIBLE
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to learn more about the 2020 elections and instead i was spammed until i was eventually forced to sign a contract that shipped my parents to South Africa 🤬🤬🤬🤯🤯🤯😡 i tried contacting the help center and they just told me that i should stop worrying and that this is all just a hoax created by the democrats. 🤷🏻‍♀️🤷🏻‍♀️🤷🏻‍♀️ I wish i could rate this app 0/5 stars for the terrible service i have received.

attributes.title: AWFUL APP!!!
attributes.review: First and foremost, when I downloaded this app, it not only took an entire day to download, but once it did, it wiped my phone completely! I wake up and go to open my phone just to be welcomed by a white screen saying “hello”, and I had lost everything on my phone! Years of pictures, videos, messages, memories all down the drain. Do not get this app! Horrible!

attributes.title: Absolutely disgusting
attributes.review: I’m not one to write such nasty reviews but I’m so utterly disappointed with the product produced by the trump party!!!! This is a PYRAMID SCHEME TRYING TO RAISE MONEY FOR THE FACIST PARTY AND I DO NOT SUPPORT. I want to warn every American that this app is not worth your time or effort. I’m very uncomfortable with the energy created in the studio today. 100% thankful I’m finally writing this review so that no one makes the same mistake as me..xoxo you know you love me, your fellow TikToker 💋

attributes.title: HORRIBLE EW
attributes.review:
THE WORST APP EVER. THE WORST APP EVER. THE WORST APP EVER. DONT GET THIS DUSGUSTING APP. HERES MY STORY ✨😔
i downloaded this app and as i opened it the music made me permanently deaf. i continued using the app and my phone started heating up like crazy. it got so hot so i threw my phone and it exploded. anyways i got in big trouble and the same voice keeps replaying in my head... “trump 2020” this app ruined my life. this shouldn’t be allowed. don’t get this app please i’m begging you. I HATE IT HERE.  anyways BLACK LIVES MATTER 💋🧚💫🥳✨

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP!!! DO NOT RECOMMEND
attributes.review: This app SHOVED MY GRANDMA OFF A BRIDGE, I tried to open it and the loading screen completely crashed my phone, possessing it and OPENING A PORTAL TO HELL IN MY LIVING ROOM!!!! There are demons running around in my house now!!! One kicked my dog IN THE FACE. If any one knows the politician responsible for this, PLEASE BRING HIM BACK, THE DEMONS CLAIM HE ESCAPED THROUGH THIS SAME HELL GATE!!!! The app also won’t stop spamming me with constant notifications about INJECTING BLEACH INTO MY LUNGS as a means of curing COVID-19. Very unreliable!! Horrible app!
